== Services ==
* Install Ubuntu for people at the <nowiki>[[/Exchange|Exchange]]</nowiki>
* Collect <nowiki>[[MassachusettsTeam/Donate|Donations]]</nowiki>
** See: LoCoTeamDealingWithMoney
* Supply Ubuntu (CDs & CD images) to the general public
* Make <nowiki>[[/AluminiumCaseBadges|Case Badges]]</nowiki> available
* Hold on demand community classes and symposiums
* Conduct outreach programs via local schools, colleges community centers and libraries

== Events ==
* Be present at <nowiki>[[LoCoComputerFairHowto|fairs]]</nowiki>
* mini-Ubucon
** See: UbuntuAtConferences
* Get involved with <nowiki>[[LoCoTeamEducation|education]]</nowiki>
** Gather <nowiki>[[LoCoTeamSpeakers|speakers]]</nowiki> for events, etc.

== Organization ==
* Support several members who are setting up Edubuntu at their schools
* Create a team <nowiki>[[LoCoCreatingMap|Member Map]]</nowiki>
* Possibly creating a <nowiki>[[LoCoCreatingPlanet|planet]]</nowiki> for the team once it's big enough
* <nowiki>[[LoCoRecruitingVolunteers|Recruit volunteers]]</nowiki>
* Work with other groups to improve peoples computing experience by increasing awareness of GNU/Linux, Digital Freedom, free software, etc.
